pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Collection of Efficient and Extremely Fast R Functions II // A collection of fast statistical and utility functions for data analysis. Functions for regression, maximum likelihood, column- wise statistics and many more have been included. C++ has been utilized to speed up the functions. References: Tsagris M., Papadakis M. (2018). Taking R to its limits: 70+ tips. PeerJ Preprints 6:e26605v1 doi:10.7287/peerj.preprints.26605v1.
